allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-project sync support to Todoist plugin

- Support multiple Todoist projects per note via todoist_ids frontmatter
- Add projectSeparator setting to control project heading format
- Add sectionFormat setting to control section heading format
- Organize tasks by Todoist sections under project headings
- Parse JSON array strings in frontmatter for project IDs
- Graceful fallback when headings aren''t found
- Update README with multi-project documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
